title: BAD BLOCK 4692143 - Error: unknown ancestor
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
Develop version: v1.8.0-unstable-6e613cf3/windows-amd64/go1.9"

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Windows
Commit hash : (if `develop`)
v1.8.0-unstable-6e613cf3
#### Expected behaviour
No error, after this my sync seems  to lag behind.
